attributes.contentHtml: This is a company that bans people for no reason you talk shit about their services or company you get fucked and you get banned they can't take criticism and the owner is always fucking moaning about how he doesn't have enough to spend with his girlfriend. He lied about his server cost when the server he is getting is only around 70-100 pound per one. This image also shows that he just is a complete twat to people behind their back. He doesn't do shit other than telling people what to do and what to work on even though they aren't getting paid in any shape or form accept for a fucking role that is called "Lead Developer" He talks like he knows shit when he can't even fuckin install proxmox
